full_summary:
**[National Workshop Agreement - Online Sale of Unapproved Consumer Electrical Products](#national-workshop-agreement---online-sale-of-unapproved-consumer-electrical-products)**

**Contract Reference: cb-5047-94918635**
**Solicitation Number: 2023-05**
**Date of Publication: April 26, 2023**
**Tender Closing Date:** June 12, 2023, at 16:00:00 (แขellaneous Time)

The Standards Council of Canada invites eligible bidders to submit their proposals to develop a National Workshop Agreement for the issue of online sales of unapproved consumer electrical products. This agreement aims to bring together stakeholders from federal, provincial, and territorial authorities, industry, consumers, and conformity assessment bodies to establish understanding and co-ordination among them.

**Key Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None specified
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity:** Standards Council of Canada
* **Contact Information:**

Lianne Bernard  
Email: contracts@scc.ca  
Phone: (613) 238-3222

**Attachments:**

Please consult the following documents:

*   [sc-RFP-2023-05-NWA-Unauthorized-Electrical-Products-Amendment1_2023-05-18\_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/5047/scc\_rfp-2023-05-nwa-unauthorized-electrical-products-amendment1\_2023-05-18\_en.pdf)
*   [sc-RFP-2023-05-NWA-Unauthorized-Electrical-Products-Final\_2023-04-26\_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/5047/scc\_rfp\_2023-05\_nwa-unauthorized-electrical-products\_final\_2023-04-26\_en.pdf)

This tender has expired. Hope my rewritten entry meets your expectations!
